textBeforeTable: Employment estimate and mean wage estimates for this occupation: National estimates for this occupation: Top National estimates for this occupation Industry profile for this occupation State profile for this occupation Metropolitan area profile for this occupation Occupational Employment and Wages, May 2007 41-2012 Gaming Change Persons and Booth Cashiers Exchange coins and tokens for patrons' money. May issue payoffs and obtain customer's signature on receipt when winnings exceed the amount held in the slot machine. May operate a booth in the slot machine area and furnish change persons with money bank at the start of the shift, or count and audit money in drawers.
